title: Dividend per share of Daimler AG 2006 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Dividend per share in euros, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2012.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2009 to 2006.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely neutral which exists from 2017 to 2015.
gold: The statistic shows the dividend per share of Daimler AG from the fiscal year of 2006 to the fiscal year of 2019 . In its 2019 fiscal year , Daimler AG paid out a dividend of approximately 0.9 euros per share .
